heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need
assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please

We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

*Ticket Number:* 00436573
*Ticket Subject:* Need support on policy making as per requirement
*Ticket Details:* Hi Team,

This is for André Le Roux.

As discussed recently, need to understand on few policies as per business
requirement. Some of them are below :

How to make policies based on data uploaded to specific applications
focusing on defined PII by us ?
How to design better by correlating Department>Groups>Policies as per the
Organization Team structure given by us ?
Check System Settings, understanding department usage, Restrictive or
Permissive
How can we enhance it's OCR detection based on defined PII structure by us ?
How can we maintain data security on Outlook, Google mail in terms of
detecting PIIs & and specific code ?
How can we apply any exclusion for specific user, without changing to other
users in policy group ?
How can we move user or remove user from current policy to different policy
?
Understanding Contextual detection
Understanding User remediation & Justification List

Let's plan a session to understand this

Thank you!

Andre Le Roux
Technical Support Engineer

www.netwrix.com

Ticket Details: Hi Team,

This is for André Le Roux.

As discussed recently, need to understand on few policies as per business requirement. Some of them are below :

How to make policies based on data uploaded to specific applications focusing on defined PII by us ?
How to design better by correlating Department>Groups>Policies as per the Organization Team structure given by us ?
Check System Settings, understanding department usage, Restrictive or Permissive
How can we enhance it's OCR detection based on defined PII structure by us ?
How can we maintain data security on Outlook, Google mail in terms of detecting PIIs & and specific code ?
How can we apply any exclusion for specific user, without changing to other users in policy group ?
How can we move user or remove user from current policy to different policy ?
Understanding Contextual detection
Understanding User remediation & Justification List

Let's plan a session to understand this

Thank you!
